<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fell Rider](/Feats.aspx?ID=5582) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=757" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 15 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
animal companion

</column>

---

You have trained with your [animal companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=2113) to become a terrifying juggernaut on the battlefield. Your animal companion becomes trained in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40). If your animal companion uses [Support](/Actions.aspx?ID=2665) while serving as your mount, it grants you the effects of the [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=2292) reaction on your first Intimidation check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395) on the same turn, even though it can't take reactions.
